name: Hyper Streak
description:
Simple controls tap or hold either side of the screen to move around obstacles and collect gems!

Hit 3 gems in-a-row to enable the super-cool warp boost to move at lightning speeds!

Hit 6 gems in-a-row to complete your streak-bar & enable your multiplier, complete the streak-bar again to increase your multiplier!

Fast addictive arcade game that will challenge the most competitive gamers to get the highest scores!
